Devil, Titivilus

This 6-foot tall creature resembles a satyr with a round hairless head, the lower torso of a goat, cloven feet, and clawed hands. Small black leathery wings sprout from his back. His eyes are the color of coal.



Titivilus

CR 20

XP 307,200
LE Medium outsider (devil, evil, extraplanar, lawful)
Init +11; Senses darkvision 60 ft., detect good, detect magic, see in darkness; Perception +34
DEFENSE
AC 41, touch 28, flat-footed 34 (+7 Dex, +13 natural, +11 profane)
hp 275 (19d10+171); regeneration 10 (good, silver)
Fort +15, Ref +20, Will +21
DR 15/good and silver; Immune fire, poison; Resist acid 10, cold 10; SR 31
OFFENSE
Spd 50 ft., fly 60 ft. (average)
Melee +3 silver wounding longsword +29/+24/+19/+14 (1d8+10/19-20 plus 1 bleed) or
fear touch +26 (fear)
Space 5 ft.; Reach 5 ft.
Special Attacks fear touch (Will DC 32, fear spell CL 20th)
Spell-Like Abilities (CL 20th)
Constant—detect good, detect magic
At Will—animate dead, bestow curse (DC 24), charm person (DC 22), confusion (DC 25), crushing despair (DC 25), dispel magic, greater invisibility, greater teleport (self plus 50 pounds of objects only), hypnotism (DC 22), illusory script, magic circle against good, message, misdirection (DC 23), nondetection, polymorph, suggestion (DC 24), tongues, unholy aura (DC 29), ventriloquism (DC 22), whispering wind
2/day—summon (level 9, 4d10 lemures or nupperibos, 1d4 bone devils or erinyes, 1d2 horned devils, or 1 pit fiend 100%)
1/day—feeblemind (DC 26), symbol of pain (DC 26), symbol of sleep (DC 26)
STATISTICS
Str 24, Dex 24, Con 28, Int 28, Wis 26, Cha 32
Base Atk +19; CMB +26; CMD 54
Feats Alertness, Cleave, Great Cleave, Improved Initiative, Iron Will, Lightning Reflexes, Persuasive, Power Attack, Quicken Spell-Like Ability (confusion), Vital Strike
Skills Appraise +28, Bluff +40, Diplomacy +38, Escape Artist +29, Fly +29, Intimidate +37, Knowledge (arcana) +28, Knowledge (history) +28, Knowledge (local) +28, Knowledge (planes) +31, Knowledge (religion) +28, Perception +34, Sense Motive +34, Stealth +29, Survival +30; Racial Modifiers +4 Bluff, +4 Diplomacy
Languages Abyssal, Celestial, Common, Daemonic, Draconic, Giant, Goblin, Ignan, Infernal, Terran; telepathy 100 ft.
Combat Gear +3 silver wounding longsword
ECOLOGY
Environment any (Hell)
Organization solitary or troupe (Titivilus pls 2-4 erinyes or bearded devils)
Treasure double standard
SPECIAL ABILITIES
Fear Touch (Su) A creature that successfully saves cannot be affected again by Titivilus's fear touch for one day. The save DC is Charisma-based.


Titivilus the Confuser serves Lord Dispater as messenger and chamberlain. He is a very evil and malign duke. His ability to manipulate others is legendary throughout the Hells, and it is because of this gift that Dispater allows him to attend infernal meetings where dukes are normally prohibited.

Titivilus spends most of his days in his tower, Martyr's Curse, a large structure composed of blackened iron. When encountered away from his tower he usually has a small retinue of bearded devils or erinyes with him.

Titivilus stands 6 feet tall and weighs 220 pounds.

Titivilus prefers to avoid combat, if possible. If pressed, he attacks with his spell-like abilities, seeking to sew confusion and disorder among his adversaries. In close combat, he uses his longsword, but usually summons other devils before such combat occurs. If facing imminent defeat, Titivilus summons other devils to cover his escape.
